alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Kingfisher (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 2:54PM CDT until May 04 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN KINGFISHER AND SOUTHWESTERN GARFIELD COUNTIES... At 254 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Waukomis, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hennessey, Waukomis, Drummond, Bison and Lacey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
